entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain changing to rain mixed with snow near midnight then to flurries overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
